array.name: test_info
array.item: Follow these simple steps buy listening to different sounds and evaluating them
When you press play it will play a sound from a low frequency and go higher. When you hear it press stop. This shows how low frequencies your earphones can play or how low you can hear.
Same as previous but on the high end
Same as previous but on the high end
Same as previous but on the high end
Same as previous but on the high end
